short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to play HTML5 Video element without a full screen option, such as YT shorts and Instagram reels, in full screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension to play HTML5 Video element in full screen. It lets you play videos without a full screen option, such as YouTube shorts and Instagram/Facebook reels, in full screen. 
After turning the extension ON by toggling the switch provided via the extension popup, you'll see a full screen button on the top right corner of each compatible video. You can then go full screen by clicking this button. Alternatively you can press the Shift + V shortcut keys to go full screen on the current video.
